name: Dreamfall: The Longest Journey - Limited Edition
summary: The limited edition of Dreamfall has the base game with different cover art, the original The Longest Journey, and contains a 4-track soundtrack CD by Magnet and a 90-page hardback art book. If you preordered the game before 29th April 2006, 3 limited edition A5 prints were included as well. This version can only be bought through the Funcom online store.
